You know you’re doing something right when everyone who sleeps in your bed tells you how comfortable it is. I never have to ask; they just volunteer that info, which really says a lot about my bedding. Over the past couple of years, I made one big change that really upped my bedding game: I finally got a mattress pad.

Don’t get me wrong — my bed was already super comfy. But I tend to sleep hot, and my memory foam mattress wasn’t helping with that. Instead of swapping out my perfectly good mattress, I decided to try a breathable mattress pad. To my surprise, it made my bed even cozier! I went with the Coyuchi Organic Cotton Mattress Pad, and I have no regrets. Not only does it help keep me cool at night, but its cushioning makes my mattress feel even more comfortable than it was before (and that’s saying something!). 

What Is the Coyuchi Organic Cotton Mattress Pad?

The Coyuchi Organic Cotton Mattress Pad — available in sizes Twin through California King — adds a soft, breathable layer to your mattress for a more comfortable sleep experience. Made from 100% organic cotton, it provides extra cushioning and helps regulate temperature, making it a great option if you sleep hot. It’s also free from the chemical smell that some pads and protectors tend to have.

Designed with deep pockets and a quilted pattern, it also stays securely in place, so you don’t have to worry about it shifting around at night. Plus, it’s easy to care for — just toss it in the washing machine. It’s designed to get softer with every wash, so it’ll only get better over time! 

Why I Love Coyuchi’s Organic Cotton Mattress Pad

As a hot sleeper, I’m always on the hunt for anything that helps keep me cool — and thank goodness I found the Coyuchi Organic Cotton Mattress Pad. From the first night, I noticed a real difference. It adds breathability to my mattress, keeping me at a comfortable temperature instead of waking up sweaty and annoyed (if you know, you know). But that’s not the only reason I love it.

The deep pockets of this pad keep it from sliding around, unlike some of the flimsier ones I’ve owned in the past. And I was pleasantly surprised to see that it also lives up to its “gets softer with each wash” claims. It’s truly so much better than the paper-thin protectors I used to settle for, and I know this one will last me for years (it doesn’t hurt that it’s made with high-quality, responsibly sourced organic materials, either). So while I might have splurged a little, I’m happy I did. I sleep so much better with this mattress pad, and I know you will, too! 

Buy: Coyuchi Organic Cotton Mattress Pad, Queen, $298
